00031 
00032 bool CSegmentate::DeriveBlobs(CStdImage& Source, CPixelGroups& PixelGroups,
00033                                         COLORTYPE Color, UINT8 Threshold, CONNECTIVITY Connected)
00034 {
00035         PixelGroups.Empty();
00036         if (k_DeriveBlobs(Source.GetTImagePtr(),PixelGroups.GetTPixelGroupsPtr(),
00037                     Color,Threshold,Connected)==false)
00038         {
00039                 ostringstream ost;
00040                 ost << "CSegmentate::DeriveBlobs() Failed deriving blobs" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00041                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00042                 return false;
00043         }
00044         PixelGroups.Update();
00045 /*      string str("CSegmentate::DeriveBlobs() with:");
00046         ostringstream ost;
00047         ost << " Color=" << Color << " Threshold=" << Threshold << " Connected=" << Connected;
00048         str.append(ost.str());
00049         Source.m_History.AppendIPL(str);*/
00050         return true;
00051 }
00052 
00053 bool CSegmentate::BlobExpansion(const CPoint2D<INT16>& Seed, CImage& Source, 
00054                                                                 CPixelGroup& PixelGroup,UINT8 Threshold, CONNECTIVITY Connected)
00055 {
00056         T2DInt P;
00057         P.x=Seed.GetX();
00058         P.y=Seed.GetY();
00059         if (k_BlobExpansion(P,Source.GetTImagePtr(),PixelGroup.GetTPixelGroupPtr(),Threshold, Connected)==false)
00060         {
00061                 ostringstream ost;
00062                 ost << "CSegmentate::BlobExpansion() Failed expanding blob" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00063                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00064                 return false;
00065         }
00066         return true;
00067 }
00068 
00069 bool CSegmentate::FindAndFollowLowContour(CStdImage& Source, const CPoint2D<int>& Start,
00070                                                            DIRECTION SearchDirection, CONNECTIVITY Connected,
00071                                                            CPixelGroup& PixelGroup,ROTATION& RotationDirection,
00072                                                                 COLORTYPE& SurroundedColor)
00073 {
00074         T2DInt p;
00075         p.x=Start.GetX();
00076         p.y=Start.GetY();
00077         if (k_FindAndFollowLowContour(Source.GetTImagePtr(),p,SearchDirection,
00078                         Connected,PixelGroup.GetTPixelGroupPtr(),&RotationDirection,&SurroundedColor)==false)
00079         {
00080                 ostringstream ost;
00081                 ost << "CSegmentate::FindAndFollowLowContour() Failed finding contour" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00082                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00083                 return false;
00084         }
00085         return true;
00086 }
00087

00102                 return false;

00104         return true;
00105 }
